transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yeah, Harris Electronics?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Yeah, ma'am, Hardware IndiaMART, right?
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Okay, so you are only checking IndiaMART?
Customer: Who?
Executive: You are checking IndiaMART or who is checking IndiaMART?
Customer: Yeah, I am I am the person.
Executive: You are looking after this. Okay, okay. Uh, we already had discussion regarding the mail, right?
Customer: Uh, we already received for a field visit.
Executive: Yeah, yeah. So, uh, what is the update regarding that? Because I told you we cannot provide the same.
Customer: Sir, we want that.
Executive: Okay, but uh
Customer: We already discussed with our owners and representatives. They told that field visit should be done by IndiaMART.
Executive: But we cannot provide this facility, sir. Package, I think yearly package they have done.
Customer: No, yesterday someone else
Executive: [unintelligible]
Customer: Uh, yesterday one of your staff told that she is okay if field visit is provided.
Executive: I had been worked with you or someone else?
Customer: Uh, that's not me. That's our team leader.
Executive: So you, who is actually looking? You are looking or she is looking?
Customer: Yes, ma'am, me.
Executive: [unintelligible]

[silence]

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yeah, hello.
Customer: Yeah, this is Deepika.
Executive: Yes, yes.
Customer: Okay, tell me Deepika.
Executive: Yeah, very good afternoon, ma'am. Uh, yes, your team member said that you want field visit.
Customer: I told you yesterday, I think they have informed you, right? Field visit if you are not providing, it's okay.
Executive: But currently she said that you are requiring. But we cannot provide. I, see, ma'am, it's about telling you the reality, right? We cannot do any false things or say any false things which we cannot actually fulfill, right? So that is the thing. I am telling you we cannot provide, ma'am.
Customer: Okay, exactly. So I have told you what what I know and what we are supposed to tell you. So I have clearly spoken to you.
Customer: Okay, you can close the ticket access now. If you require anything, we will contact you guys back.
Executive: It's not about closing. It's about providing you the clear picture of the things which we can render to you, right? We will provide you 1000% the online support, right? Which is through Google Meets and calls. But this field we cannot provide. That is why I am connecting you for the same. So are you okay with that? Have you conveyed the same to the owner?
Customer: Uh, we have conveyed that. Uh, since she has not replied us because it's not in a situation to reply us. So once she reply, she is informing, we will we will inform you once.
Executive: But we cannot prolong this, right? This one word you just convey, ma'am, because she's not in a
Customer: That's what we are saying. Just let me convey that because she is not in a situation that we can't call her and disturb. You have to understand that. She is in our loss. So we can't disturb her.
Executive: I agree.
Customer: So I have informed whatever you guys have informed, but I have informed two to three times. She has not responded. Okay? Once she respond, we can inform you guys.
Executive: So by when will she confirm? Because
Customer: That we are not I know that, but you have to understand. She has staff over here. We can't ask her to what to say, ma'am, they are asking regarding this. We have informed them.
Executive: But you said that you do not required. So with whom you have discussed that you have conveyed this to me that okay, it will be fine if you will not provide.
Customer: We have already informed them. We have already informed. We have already informed them. As far as our role is, we have informed you guys. Again you guys are keep on calling and asking and saying the same thing. That's what I'm saying. If you want to close the ticket, you can close the ticket. If in case if we want any service like directly field visit is whatever they are saying, we will inform you guys once they come to our shop. As soon as they are not in the shop and we are not in the position to call them and disturb.
Executive: But you said know that you are okay if field visit is not provided. So I thought that's why you asked what she has what she has informed, I'm informing you guys. Again you are calling and asking the same reason. So what what can I say?
Customer: Okay, so she told you that she is okay with if no field visit is provided.
Customer: That's what she told. If you are giving the Google Meet and whatever telecalling, whatever you are giving, it's okay, we will attend that. And in case if we have any doubt or anything, we will be going you and we will clarify that.
Executive: So because if field visit is not provided, you are okay, right?
Customer: That's why we are not providing, right? Then how can we keep on lagging this? If you are not providing that, it's okay, we don't required.
Executive: Okay. Okay, ma'am. Thank you. Thank you.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants field visit for IndiaMART subscription.

- Expresses frustration with repeated calls about field visit.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified field visits cannot be provided.

- Customer agreed to online support via Google Meets.

- Customer will inform if field visit is required.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to close the ticket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, subscription, google meet, online support
